description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Accounting Team supports the Chief Financial Officer by tracking all of the district’s money. It maintains systems that principals use to track their funds and generates reports for federal, state, and local funders. OUSD receives money from over 250 funding sources which are spent across more than 130 school sites or centrally managed programs.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
